bibl.title: List of slavers captured, June 25, 1858
Despatches from United States Consuls in Sierra Leone, 1858-1906 T-438

div1.p: Majesty Cruizers on the West Coast of Africa & sent to Sierra Leone for condemnation
div1.ab: By what vessel captured Place of capture Date of Capture State in Which the ship was found Result of Procedings H. M. Fretown Sierra Leone
June 25th 1858
John E Taylow
Actg United States Consul
